database.name: VIEW SCR_OTHER_PAY_SCHED_DETAIL_V
database.view: SELECT boefrom_psd.sco_boefrom_payschedetail_id AS scr_other_pay_sched_detail_v_id, boefrom_psd.ad_client_id, boefrom_psd.ad_org_id, boefrom_psd.isactive, boefrom_psd.created, boefrom_psd.createdby, boefrom_psd.updated, boefrom_psd.updatedby, 'Y' AS issotrx, boefrom_psd.fin_payment_scheduledetail_id, boefrom.sco_boe_from_id AS boefrom_psd_lirefid, boedoc.sco_billofexchange_id AS boefrom_psd_docrefid, NULL AS retv_psd_linerefid, NULL AS retv_psd_docrefid, NULL AS retc_psd_lirefid, NULL AS retc_psd_docrefid, boefrom_psd.amount FROM sco_boefrom_payschedetail boefrom_psd JOIN sco_boe_from boefrom ON boefrom.sco_boe_from_id = boefrom_psd.sco_boe_from_id JOIN sco_billofexchange boedoc ON boedoc.sco_billofexchange_id = boefrom.sco_billofexchange_id WHERE boefrom_psd.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT retv_psd.sco_swlrecli_payschedetail_id AS scr_other_pay_sched_detail_v_id, retv_psd.ad_client_id, retv_psd.ad_org_id, retv_psd.isactive, retv_psd.created, retv_psd.createdby, retv_psd.updated, retv_psd.updatedby, 'Y' AS issotrx, retv_psd.fin_payment_scheduledetail_id, NULL AS boefrom_psd_lirefid, NULL AS boefrom_psd_docrefid, retfrom.sco_swithho_rec_line_id AS retv_psd_linerefid, retdoc.sco_swithholding_receipt_id AS retv_psd_docrefid, NULL AS retc_psd_lirefid, NULL AS retc_psd_docrefid, retv_psd.amount FROM sco_swlrecli_payschedetail retv_psd JOIN sco_swithho_rec_line retfrom ON retfrom.sco_swithho_rec_line_id = retv_psd.sco_swithho_rec_line_id JOIN sco_swithholding_receipt retdoc ON retdoc.sco_swithholding_receipt_id = retfrom.sco_swithholding_receipt_id WHERE retv_psd.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT retc_psd.sco_pwlrecli_payschedetail_id AS scr_other_pay_sched_detail_v_id, retc_psd.ad_client_id, retc_psd.ad_org_id, retc_psd.isactive, retc_psd.created, retc_psd.createdby, retc_psd.updated, retc_psd.updatedby, 'N' AS issotrx, retc_psd.fin_payment_scheduledetail_id, NULL AS boefrom_psd_lirefid, NULL AS boefrom_psd_docrefid, NULL AS retv_psd_linerefid, NULL AS retv_psd_docrefid, retfrom.sco_pwithho_rec_line_id AS retc_psd_lirefid, retdoc.sco_pwithholding_receipt_id AS retc_psd_docrefid, retc_psd.amount FROM sco_pwlrecli_payschedetail retc_psd JOIN sco_pwithho_rec_line retfrom ON retfrom.sco_pwithho_rec_line_id = retc_psd.sco_pwithho_rec_line_id JOIN sco_pwithholding_receipt retdoc ON retdoc.sco_pwithholding_receipt_id = retfrom.sco_pwithholding_receipt_id WHERE retc_psd.isactive = 'Y'
